Paul Slabolepszy (a mụrụ n'afọ 1948), ma ọ bụ Paul "Slab", bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu na South Africa.
A mụrụ Slabolepszy na Bolton, England
Nne ya bụ onye Bekee na nna ya bụ onye Poland gbara ọsọ ndụ
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara South Africa.
Ọ tolitere na Musina, Pietersburg na Witbank
Slabolepszy gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ndị Katọlik, College of the Little Flower na Polokwane.
Ebumnuche mbụ ya bụ ịghọ onye na-akọwa egwuregwu redio
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-egwu bọọlụ, ọ ga-ekwu okwu ma dekọọ nkọwa maka igwu egwu mgbe e mesịrị
N'oge na-adịghị anya, nkọwa ndị a ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ
Slabolepszy wee gbasaa nke a iji mee akụkọ egwuregwu
Akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo ahụ nabatara ụfọdụ n'ime onyinye ya ya mere ọ ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ egwuregwu bipụtara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ.
Na mbụ, ọ na-ezube ịchụso ọrụ na redio, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bekee na Drama na Mahadum Cape Town
N'oge a, ọ hụrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya ma na-ejide ya na mkpọtụ na mmetụta nke ngwa ngwa
O wee kpebie ilekwasị anya n'ime ihe nkiri.
N'afọ 1983, Paul natara Standard Bank Young Artist Award.
O doro anya na ọ bụ onye edemede egwuregwu a ma ama na South Africa mgbe Athol Fugard gasịrị, Slabolepszy bụ onye edemedi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye guzobere The Space Theatre, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ na-abụghị agbụrụ na South Africa, ya na Athol Fugard, Yvonne Bryceland na John Kani n'afọ 1972
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere The Market Theatre a ma ama n'ụwa niile na Johannesburg, ya na Mannie Manim na Barney Simon n'afọ 1976.
Egwuregwu ya na-eji obi erughị ala na ejighị n'aka nke ndị ọcha South Africa nọ n'etiti.
Ọ bụ enyi ogologo oge na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye na'eme ihe nkiri Bill Flynn
Slabolepszy enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, gụnyere ihe nrite ọ bụla nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'afọ 1993 maka ọrụ Eddie na akwụkwọ ya The Return of Elvis Du Pisanie

Egwuregwu a nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye karịa egwuregwu ọ bụla ọzọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe nkiri South Africa. Ndị a gụnyere 1993 Vita, Fleur du Cap na Dalro Awards, Best New South African Play, Best Actor, Best Production, Best Director ♡ yana The Star Tonight IGI Life Vita Award for Comedy.
A na-eme ihe nkiri ya na mba ụwa.
